name: MISSING (vanyl)
description:
Synopsis

You're playing Pix who's looking for Balloon her loyal friend. To find him you'll walk through different places. This game is in French. I made the drawings and the characters in pixels.

Enjoy !

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Project done over the course of my game developer training (Interface 3). It's my first game made with Game Maker older version (1.4).  We had to create minimum five rooms (plateforms, camera view, labyrinth) and one of them had to be inspired by Minuscule universe (that's why you become an insect for one room bzz lol)
